column1: 50354944$Gaia the Fierce Knight Origin$$EARTH$[Warrior/effect]$$$$$4$1600$1200$$$$This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Warrior monster. You can only use each of the following effects of "Gaia the Fierce Knight Origin" once per turn. You can send 1 Level 5 or higher monster from your hand to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. During the Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY
column2: then target 1 monster on the field whose current ATK is different from its original ATK; its ATK becomes its original ATK.$$$$$
